metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v7.14.0 - New: Modernized deep-research skill with interactive clarification (3 questions), cost transparency banners, and task agent integration. Claude Code v2.1.20+ features: Task Management, Session Variables, MCP Detection. BREAKING: Requires Claude Code v2.1.16+. Commands '/octo:*'. Run /octo:setup.
